metadata.title: CVE-2021-4048 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read flaw was found in the CLARRV, DLARRV, SLARRV, andZLARRV functions in lapack through version 3.10.0, as also used in OpenBLASbefore version 0.3.18. Specially crafted inputs passed to these functionscould cause an application using lapack to crash or possibly discloseportions of its memory.

criterions.comment: lapack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
openblas: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
